name: VehicleBuster
description:
Controls:

A , D to control the Vehicle.

ESC to pause the Game.

Vehicle buster is an Offline car chase game and is one of the fastest car chase game where you escape and destroy the enemy vehicle for as long time as possible.  Choose from various vehicle that include cars, scooter to get away from enemy and collect buster coins  Health are scattered over places to enhance health of your car. 

Features

* 4 unlockable cars.

* Each car with different speed and steering capabilities.

* Present with secret amount of coin are available around the map.

*Two different mode to play from.

Available on google play

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.neplay.vehicleBuster
